Texts.Chs: 不要忘记，某些植物对于维持基因研究实验室是^green;必不可少的^reset;。至少，你会用到^orange;飞螳种子^reset;和^orange;蕨树种子^reset;，因为这些植物产生的资源很有用处。
Texts.Eng: Don't forget that certain plants are ^green;almost essential^reset; for a viable gene-research laboratory. At the very least, you'll want ^orange;Mutavisk Seeds^reset; and ^orange;Bracken Tree Seeds^reset; for the resources they produce.

Texts.Chs: 每个伟大的植物学家都是从某方面开始着手的。有了^orange;温室^reset;在你家里，你就可以创造各种各样有着^green;梦幻般加成与能力^reset;的植物，来让你的生活更轻松。立即建造一个吧。
Texts.Eng: Every great botanist needs to start somewhere. With a ^orange;Greenhouse^reset; in your home you can craft all sorts of plants that bestow ^green;fantastic buffs and abilities^reset; to make your life easier. Build one now.
